com.microsoft.windowsazure.services.blob.models

Class CopyBlobOptions

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.microsoft.windowsazure.services.blob.models.BlobServiceOptions
      • com.microsoft.windowsazure.services.blob.models.CopyBlobOptions

  • public class CopyBlobOptions
extends BlobServiceOptions
    Represents the options that may be set on a copyBlob request. These options include an optional server timeout for the operation, an optional source snapshot timestamp value to copy from a particular snapshot of the source blob, blob metadata to set on the destination blob, a blob lease ID to overwrite a blob with an active lease, a source lease ID to copy from a source blob with an active lease, any access conditions to satisfy on the destination, and any access conditions to satisfy on the source.

      • getSourceSnapshot

        public java.lang.String getSourceSnapshot()
        Gets the source snapshot timestamp value set in this CopyBlobOptions instance.
        Returns:
        A String containing the snapshot timestamp value of the source blob snapshot to list.

      • setSourceSnapshot

        public CopyBlobOptions setSourceSnapshot(java.lang.String sourceSnapshot)
        Sets the snapshot timestamp value used to identify the particular snapshot of the source blob to copy. The snapshot timestamp value is an opaque value returned by the server to identify a snapshot. When this option is set, the properties, metadata, and content of the snapshot are copied to the destination.

        Note that this value only affects calls made on methods where this ListBlobBlocksOptions instance is passed as a parameter.

        Parameters:
        sourceSnapshot - A String containing the snapshot timestamp value of the source blob snapshot to list.
        Returns:
        A reference to this ListBlobBlocksOptions instance.

      • getMetadata

        public java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> getMetadata()
        Gets the blob metadata collection set in this CopyBlobOptions instance.
        Returns:
        A HashMap of name-value pairs of String containing the blob metadata set, if any.

      • setMetadata

        public CopyBlobOptions setMetadata(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> metadata)
        Sets the blob metadata collection to associate with the destination blob. Metadata is a collection of name-value String pairs for client use and is opaque to the server. Metadata names must adhere to the naming rules for C# identifiers.

        Note that if any metadata is set with this option, no source blob metadata will be copied to the destination blob.

        The metadata value only affects calls made on methods where this CreateBlobOptions instance is passed as a parameter.

        Parameters:
        metadata - A HashMap of name-value pairs of String containing the blob metadata to set.
        Returns:
        A reference to this CreateBlobOptions instance.

      • addMetadata

        public CopyBlobOptions addMetadata(java.lang.String key,
                          java.lang.String value)
        Adds a name-value pair to the blob metadata collection associated with this CopyBlobOptions instance.

        Note that if any metadata is set with this option, no source blob metadata will be copied to the destination blob.

        Parameters:
        key - A String containing the name portion of the name-value pair to add to the metadata collection.
        value - A String containing the value portion of the name-value pair to add to the metadata collection.
        Returns:
        A reference to this CopyBlobOptions instance.

      • getLeaseId

        public java.lang.String getLeaseId()

      • setLeaseId

        public CopyBlobOptions setLeaseId(java.lang.String leaseId)
        Sets a lease ID value to match on the destination blob. If set, there must be an active lease with a matching lease ID set on the destination blob for the operation to succeed.

        Note that this value only affects calls made on methods where this CopyBlobOptions instance is passed as a parameter.

        Parameters:
        leaseId - A String containing the lease ID to set.
        Returns:
        A reference to this CopyBlobOptions instance.
